entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 3:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
